verses.verse: And one<WG1520> of the seven<WG2033> angels<WG32> who had<WG2192> the seven<WG2033> bowls<WG5357> came<WG2064> and spoke<WG2980> with me, saying,<WG3004> "Come<WG1204> here,<WG1204> I shall show<WG1166> you the judgment<WG2917> of the great<WG3173> harlot<WG4204> who sits<WG2521> on many<WG4183> waters,<WG5204>

with whom<WG3739> the kings<WG935> of the earth<WG1093> committed<WG4203> [acts of] immorality,<WG4203> and those<WG3588> who dwell<WG2730> on the earth<WG1093> were made<WG3184> drunk<WG3184> with the wine<WG3631> of her immorality.<WG4202> "

And he carried<WG667> me away<WG667> in the Spirit<WG4151> into a wilderness;<WG2048> and I saw<WG3708> a woman<WG1135> sitting<WG2521> on a scarlet<WG2847> beast,<WG2342> full<WG1073> of blasphemous<WG988> names,<WG3686> having<WG2192> seven<WG2033> heads<WG2776> and ten<WG1176> horns.<WG2768>

And the woman<WG1135> was clothed<WG4016> in purple<WG4210> and scarlet,<WG2847> and adorned<WG5558> with gold<WG5553> and precious<WG5093> stones<WG3037> and pearls,<WG3135> having<WG2192> in her hand<WG5495> a gold<WG5552> cup<WG4221> full<WG1073> of abominations<WG946> and of the unclean<WG169> things<WG169> of her immorality,<WG4202>

and upon her forehead<WG3359> a name<WG3686> [was] written,<WG1125> a mystery,<WG3466> "BABYLON<WG897> THE GREAT,<WG3173> THE MOTHER<WG3384> OF HARLOTS<WG4204> AND OF THE ABOMINATIONS<WG946> OF THE EARTH.<WG1093>"

And I saw<WG3708> the woman<WG1135> drunk<WG3184> with the blood<WG129> of the saints,<WG40> and with the blood<WG129> of the witnesses<WG3144> of Jesus.<WG2424> And when I saw<WG3708> her, I wondered<WG2296> greatly.<WG2295> <WG3173>

And the angel<WG32> said<WG3004> to me, "Why<WG1223> <WG5101> do you wonder<WG2296>? I shall tell<WG3004> you the mystery<WG3466> of the woman<WG1135> and of the beast<WG2342> that carries<WG941> her, which has<WG2192> the seven<WG2033> heads<WG2776> and the ten<WG1176> horns.<WG2768>

"The beast<WG2342> that you saw<WG3708> was and is not, and is about<WG3195> to come<WG305> up out of the abyss<WG12> and to go<WG5217> to destruction.<WG684> And those<WG3588> who dwell<WG2730> on the earth<WG1093> will wonder,<WG2296> whose<WG3739> name<WG3686> has not been written<WG1125> in the book<WG975> of life<WG2222> from the foundation<WG2602> of the world,<WG2889> when they see<WG991> the beast,<WG2342> that he was and is not and will come.<WG3918>
"Here<WG5602> is the mind<WG3563> which has<WG2192> wisdom.<WG4678> The seven<WG2033> heads<WG2776> are seven<WG2033> mountains<WG3735> on which<WG3699> the woman<WG1135> sits,<WG2521>

and they are seven<WG2033> kings;<WG935> five<WG4002> have fallen,<WG4098> one<WG1520> is, the other<WG243> has not yet<WG3768> come;<WG2064> and when<WG3752> he comes,<WG2064> he must<WG1163> remain<WG3306> a little<WG3641> while.<WG3641>
"And the beast<WG2342> which<WG3739> was and is not, is himself<WG846> also<WG2532> an eighth,<WG3590> and is [one] of the seven,<WG2033> and he goes<WG5217> to destruction.<WG684>

"And the ten<WG1176> horns<WG2768> which<WG3739> you saw<WG3708> are ten<WG1176> kings,<WG935> who<WG3748> have not yet<WG3768> received<WG2983> a kingdom,<WG932> but they receive<WG2983> authority<WG1849> as kings<WG935> with the beast<WG2342> for one<WG1520> hour.<WG5610>
"These<WG3778> have<WG2192> one<WG1520> purpose<WG1106> and they give<WG1325> their power<WG1411> and authority<WG1849> to the beast.<WG2342>

"These<WG3778> will wage<WG4170> war<WG4170> against<WG3326> the Lamb,<WG721> and the Lamb<WG721> will overcome<WG3528> them, because<WG3754> He is Lord<WG2962> of lords<WG2962> and King<WG935> of kings,<WG935> and those<WG3588> who<WG3588> are with Him [are the] called<WG2822> and chosen<WG1588> and faithful.<WG4103>"

And he said<WG3004> to me, "The waters<WG5204> which<WG3739> you saw<WG3708> where<WG3757> the harlot<WG4204> sits,<WG2521> are peoples<WG2992> and multitudes<WG3793> and nations<WG1484> and tongues.<WG1100>

"And the ten<WG1176> horns<WG2768> which<WG3739> you saw,<WG3708> and the beast,<WG2342> these<WG3778> will hate<WG3404> the harlot<WG4204> and will make<WG4160> her desolate<WG2049> and naked,<WG1131> and will eat<WG2068> her flesh<WG4561> and will burn<WG2618> her up with fire.<WG4442>

"For God<WG2316> has put<WG1325> it in their hearts<WG2588> to execute<WG4160> His purpose<WG1106> by having<WG4160> a common<WG1520> purpose,<WG1106> and by giving<WG1325> their kingdom<WG932> to the beast,<WG2342> until<WG891> the words<WG3056> of God<WG2316> should be fulfilled.<WG5055>
"And the woman<WG1135> whom<WG3739> you saw<WG3708> is the great<WG3173> city,<WG4172> which reigns<WG2192> <WG932> over<WG1909> the kings<WG935> of the earth.<WG1093>"
